abstract: Twenty-five employees of Babeland, adult toy store with three locations in New York City, vote to join Retail, Wholesale and Department Store Union; say they are seeking greater transparency around hiring, promotion and disciplinary decisions.

headline.print_headline: Sex Shop Workers to Join Retail Union in New York
headline.main: Sex Shop Workers Welcome the Protections of a Retail Union

keywords.value: Retail, Wholesale and Department Store Union
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The employees of Babeland, an adult toy store in New York City, voted to join a labor union, citing common issues and others specific to their work and to transgender employees.
lead_paragraph: The employees of Babeland, an adult toy store in New York City, voted to join a labor union, citing common issues and others specific to their work and to transgender employees.
